H3.text: who won the gold for the men 's figure skating. Yuzuru Hanyu

A4.text: Yuzuru Hanyu won the event with a new Olympic record of 280.09 points, finishing ahead of Patrick Chan and Denis Ten.

A5.text: Patrick Chan finished as the silver medalist, not gold.
